page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: THE BOURNE-ARTON FAMILY OWN ALL THE FARMING LAND IN THE AREA.THERE ARE ELEVEN FARMS AND THEY ARE ALL INTENSIVE MIXED FARMS APART FROM TWO. THE VARIETIES OF CROPS IN THE AREA ARE BARLEY,WHEAT,OATS,SUGAR BEET,POTATOES, TURNIPS AND MANGOLDS.ALL THE FARMS HAVE SOME ANIMALS EXCEPT ONE FARM AND ALL HAVE SHEEP EXCEPT TWO FARMS.TWO FARMS PRODUCE MILK AND ALL EXCEPT TWO FARMS GROW CEREALS FOR THEIR OWN LIVE STOCK ENTERPRISES.SIX GROW POTATOES,ONE GROWS SUGAR BEET ,75% OF THE BARLEY IS WINTER BARLEY,IT IS HARVESTED IN LATE JULY.MOST OF THE FARM LABOURERS LIVE LOCALLY AND ARE NOW EARNING AT LEAST Â£100 A WEEK.THEY HAVE 4 WEEKS HOLIDAY EVERY YEAR.ALL BUT ONE OF THE FARMS HAVE A COMBINE. ALL PIGS ARE SOLD TO FACTORIES AT LEEMING BAR AND MALTON.LIVESTOCK IS SOLD AT RIPON ,MASHAM ,THIRSK MARKETS.
